name: Burnout
summary:
Burnout is a racing video game developed by Criterion Games and published by Acclaim Entertainment for the PlayStation 2, GameCube and Xbox.

Burnout was the first in a series of high-speed racing games noted for over-the-top crashes and high-risk gameplay mechanics.
